original_text: As he clothed himself with cursing like as with his garment, so let it come into his bowels like water, and like oil into his bones.
korean_text: 또 저주하기를 옷 입듯 하더니 저주가 물 같이 그의 몸 속으로 들어가며 기름 같이 그의 뼈 속으로 들어갔나이다

sentences.original_text: As he clothed himself with cursing
so let it come into his bowels
and like oil into his bones
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기름처럼 그의 뼈에 들어가게 하라
